task.title: Creating a Board
task.shortdesc: Directions for creating a board in Trello

step.cmd: In the top right of the webpage you will see a plus sign, click it.
A menu will be brought up displaying three different actions, choose the create board option.
Now you will see a little text box saying "add board title", this is where you will input the name of the board you wish to create.
Next, you will see "No team" this is where you will add a team if you are part of a pre-existing team. You can click no team if you are not apart of any team.
Now on the right you will see some background images you can use, that is purely for cosmetic purposes only but feel free to browswe through them and pick your favorite.

Lastly you can select what kind of template you wish to follow, there are many to choose from that will give you the basic outline for whatever you need. For example you can get business, education,Engineering templates and much more depending on your needs.
After choosing to use a template or not now you can finally click create board and there you have it your board has been created.
